code: import{FiClock,FiUser,FiVideo}from'react-icons/fi';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const IconWrapper=_ref=>{let{icon:Icon,size}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{size:size});};export const RecentActivity=()=>{const activities=[{id:'1',type:'video',title:'Guard Passing Fundamentals',student:'Alex Pereira',time:'2 hours ago'},{id:'2',type:'session',title:'Private Lesson',student:'Israel Adesanya',time:'1 day ago'},{id:'3',type:'video',title:'Triangle Choke Setup',student:'Sean Strickland',time:'2 days ago'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"space-y-4",children:activities.map(activity=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-start gap-3 p-3 hover:bg-gray-50 rounded-lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"p-2 rounded-full bg-bjj-blue/10 text-bjj-blue mt-1",children:activity.type==='video'?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconWrapper,{icon:FiVideo,size:18}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconWrapper,{icon:FiUser,size:18})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex-1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"font-medium",children:activity.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center text-sm text-gray-500 gap-2 mt-1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconWrapper,{icon:FiUser,size:14}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:activity.student}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconWrapper,{icon:FiClock,size:14}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:activity.time})]})]})]},activity.id))});};
